name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Frederick HANSLEY, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Frederick HANSLEY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of January 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Whether the Recidivism Risk Reduction Incentive Act, 61 Pa.C.S. §§ 4501-4512, is applicable to mandatory minimum penalties imposed pursuant to 18 Pa.C.S. § 7508 and 18 Pa.C.S. § 6317?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
12 A.3d 285
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Frederick HANSLEY, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 5, 2011.
